content.text: I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat.
I feel the same way about my family and my love of rock music.
It's hard to say, but I really love "Stairway to Heaven" by Led Zeppelin.
That's a classic! I also love "Hotel California" by The Eagles.
Those are both great songs! I'm also a big fan of "Free Bird" by Lynyrd Skynyrd.
That's another classic! I love the guitar solo in that song.
Me too! It's one of the best guitar solos of all time.
I'm glad we can agree on something!
Me too! I'm always glad to meet someone who shares my love of rock music.
Me too! It's one of my favorite things in the world.
It's definitely one of mine too.
